mapper.sql: TREASURE_ID, DATE_TREASURE_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_ID, TREASURE_NAME, TREASURE_TYPE, COUPON_AMOUNT, INVENTORY, END_VALIDITY, START_VALIDITY, PIC_URL, PRIZE_WEIGHT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, B.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName, C.RANDOM_TIME FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_DATE_TREASURE_HUNT A LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_DATE_HUNT C ON A.DATE_TREASURE_ID = C.DATE_TREASURE_ID
AND A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicSpotId},'%')
AND A.TREASURE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{treasureName},'%')
AND B.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicSpotName},'%')
AND C.RANDOM_TIME = #{randomTime}
ORDER BY C.RANDOM_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_DATE_TREASURE_HUNT (TREASURE_ID, DATE_TREASURE_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_ID, TREASURE_NAME, TREASURE_TYPE, COUPON_AMOUNT, INVENTORY, END_VALIDITY, START_VALIDITY, PIC_URL, PRIZE_WEIGHT, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{treasureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{treasureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treasureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{endValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prizeWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_DATE_TREASURE_HUNT
DATE_TREASURE_ID = #{dateTreasureId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TREASURE_NAME = #{treasureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TREASURE_TYPE = #{treasureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUPON_AMOUNT = #{couponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVENTORY = #{inventory,jdbcType=BIGINT},
END_VALIDITY = #{endValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_VALIDITY = #{startValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIC_URL = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIZE_WEIGHT = #{prizeWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TREASURE_ID = #{treasureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_DATE_TREASURE_HUNT set SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DATE_TREASURE_ID = #{dateTreasureId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TREASURE_NAME = #{treasureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TREASURE_TYPE = #{treasureType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUPON_AMOUNT = #{couponAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVENTORY = #{inventory,jdbcType=BIGINT}, END_VALIDITY = #{endValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_VALIDITY = #{startValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC_URL = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIZE_WEIGHT = #{prizeWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BROADCAST_ID = #{broadcastId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
